member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.StraightenEffect
member.summary: Rotates and optionally scales an image.

remarks.p: This effect is useful for correcting photos that were taken at an angle so their horizon is not quite horizontal.
This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Straighten effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.StraightenEffect.Angle
member.summary: Specifies how much the image should be rotated. Units are specified in radians. Default value 0, range -pi/4 to pi/4.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.StraightenEffect.MaintainSize
member.summary: Specifies whether the image will be scaled such that the result fits within the original rectangle without any invalid regions, no matter how it is rotated. Default value false.

remarks.p: Please note that mode is not supported.
